articles.title: COP15: Fulfil $19bn pledge to reduce migration to Europe, Buhari tells development partners - TheCable
articles.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has asked the World Bank, African Development Bank (AfDB) and other international development partners to activate the $19 billion pledge under the One Planet Summit initiative.  The

articles.title: ESA astronaut makes history with 1st TikTok from space station - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
Washington, May 10 (IANS): The European Space Agency (ESA) astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti has become the first-ever TikToker to post a video from the International Space Station.
Cristoforetti is part of SpaceX's Crew-4 mission, which arrived at the orbiti…
